html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1994-21071994-12-140,  ,  CAN POST,  , 
PrecisOrder authorizing (a) the CANADA POST CORPORATION, through its wholly-owned subsidiary 2875047 Canada Limited, to invest up to a maximum of $1,000 to acquire 18.9% of the shares of Consortium UBI Inc. (the general partner in UBI), and (b) a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Post Corporation created for the specific purpose of acquiring units of the UBI limited partnership, to acquire 18.9% of those units for no more than $10,100,000.
Attachments
